channel.title: C4D Project *Update
channel.description:
Sooo I'm working on a room.. And I need some nice tile textures, but I'll look for those later..
Heres what I have to far
It was a 1 minute pillow so don't complain..
[IMG]http://img510.imageshack.us/img510/3113/stuffpa9.jpg[/img]

item.title: C4D Project *Update
item.dc:creator: @XharveyX XharveyX
item.description:
@XharveyX wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:31, topic:130946”][quote author=XharveyX link=topic=181643.msg1660648#msg1660648 date=1186598889]
whats up with the curtain? and you better be putting colour in the room! lol

[/quote]

Whats wrong with the curtains?..[/quote]
Its really small and the room looks dull. All you need is a bigger window a more colourful room and it’ll look better! (i cant say good because it already is =P)

Read full topic

item.title: C4D Project *Update
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

Yeah you need more color.
A light that casts shadows.
Something in the window.
Unless you live on a humongous prairie, I doubt you can see the whole sky with no obstructions from that POV.

Other then that you’re on your way.

Read full topic

Like his modeled toothbrush is bigger than the toilet he downloaded.

item.title: C4D Project *Update
item.dc:creator: @SomethingToHide STH
item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“FastBawlz, post:15, topic:130946”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=181643.msg1658856#msg1658856 date=1186527480]
Haha yeah I just noticed Maru’s reply.
Where the hell did he come from O_o
Must be realllll new. Cause I’ve never heard of him before yesterday lol.
He has some nerve to say that though.

Shit man. I remember a whileee ago when I first started posting my work here.
Everyone thought it was amazing. Now I come back and lots of people are trying it out.
And then they ego gets built up and they think they can try to be a e-hardass
[/quote]

Well you have been gone for like a year… Well almost…

Anyways I found a tutorial on how to make this retro couch…

So its probably going to take me forever to make something like that…

I made the basic look of it…[/quote]

True that.

I support that you guys are learning.
But it seems that the “best” of you guys just download materials and objects and put them together.

Read full topic

item.title: C4D Project *Update
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“maru, post:4, topic:130946”]Haha, FastBawlz has to do what everyone else does

It’s ok, but not much progress. Crop your damned images as well

Good luck.[/quote]

I already was making my room before you got here :|…

[quote=“SomethingToHide, post:5, topic:130946”]The modeling looks fine. It’s just hard to see what you’re making right now.

In Render Settings change your Render Output to something like 640x480 and then use the Render in Picture Viewer. Then save what it spits out and upload that instead.

Don’t crop.[/quote]

I already knew how to do that… I was just to lazy to do it because I had to go…

Read full topic
